sense.def:
Opposition to a plan or proposal
pomeni, da ljudje načrta ali predloga ne odobravajo in poskušajo preprečiti, da bi se uresničil.

seg.quote: It was only built after much opposition from the planners.

sense.def:
The opposition
so politiki ali politične stranke, ki so v parlamentu neke države, vendar ne sodelujejo v vladi.

The opposition
so tudi ljudje, ki so proti nekomu v razpravi ali športnem dogodku.

seg.quote: The opposition consisted of chiefs and elders.
One player broke through the opposition's defence.
